Message.Title: Buffett Adds IBM :: Drops intc Stock Cold
Message.Msg: Simultaneously, while dropping intc - Buffett FIRES Berkshire Hathaway subsidiary CEO for implementing & promoting "strong arming" marketing strategies. Gee, is it any wonder Buffett dropped intc cold ? Example : AMD is intc's R&D department disguised as a competitor.. IMHO

Topic.Title: chief economist and chief strategist at National Bank Financial in Montreal:SP500 at 1350 fully priced

Message.Msg: "... I think it is not only about the Fed, but what sort of bazooka the ECB is about to unload,” said David Rosenberg, chief economist and strategist at Gluskin Sheff + Associates Inc. “It has been all this speculation about QE that revived the market off the summertime lows – it certainly wasn't earnings, revenues or guidance. So a lot is priced in, to be sure – maybe even the whole rally.”

Clint was definitely entertaining. But also, panning the audience showed many unsmiling faces. I believe (imho) the fact Mormans are pascifists became evident. I'd enjoy seeing a rerun of Clint's GOP performance. At first glance - the performance was just too entertaining. Now, for the serious side of the academy award winning actor/director - knowing Clint's dry humor, it deserves a second look....

Topic.Title: I'm just going to ignore the facts and vote Obama

Message.Msg: You can credit Bernanke for that and he alone. The economy on the other hand sux and for that you can blame okenyan.

Topic.Title: I'm just going to ignore the facts and vote Obama

Message.Msg: Okenyan? It seems that Obama would like to bring everyone down to the lowest common denominator. He really wants to help poor people...at the expense of everyone else! That is a change from most presidents who cater to the wealthy. It would be nice to see the GOP work with him instead of blocking everything that he does. He is not a great president. But, he is a good campaigner. He will kick Romney's rear. Most Americans can sense that Romney is a fake!
